    • StorageFileController

      @Autowired public StorageFileController(StorageFileService storageService)
      Instantiates a new Storage file controller.

  • Method Details

    • serveFile

      @GetMapping("/{userId}/{path}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> serveFile(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String serverAuthentication, @PathVariable long userId, @PathVariable String path) throws UserInputValidationException
      Gets the file from a folder inside a bucket with a given name for a user
      Parameters:
      serverAuthentication - the authentication token of the master server.
      userId - the id of the user who owns the file
      path - the path of the file
      Returns:
      the file as a ResponseEntity<Resource>
      Throws:
      UserInputValidationException - if the bucket, folder or file name is invalid

    • deleteFile

      @DeleteMapping("/{userId}/{path}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> deleteFile(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String serverAuthentication, @PathVariable long userId, @PathVariable String path) throws UserInputValidationException
      Deletes a file from disk, given the path and the user id
      Parameters:
      serverAuthentication - the authentication token of the master server.
      userId - the id of the user who owns the file
      path - the path of the file
      Returns:
      the file as a ResponseEntity<Resource>
      Throws:
      UserInputValidationException - if the file path is invalid

    • handleFileUploadByName

      @PostMapping("/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> handleFileUploadByName(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String serverAuthentication, @PathVariable long userId, @RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws org.springframework.web.multipart.MaxUploadSizeExceededException
      Uploads a file to a folder inside a bucket for a user
      Parameters:
      serverAuthentication - the authentication token of the master server.
      userId - the id of the user who owns the file
      file - the file to upload.
      Returns:
      the response as a Map<String, String>
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.multipart.MaxUploadSizeExceededException - if the file is too big.
      UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist.
